meanings.definition: Not joined by a chemical bond.
meanings.sent1: The two atoms were nonbonded, so they could easily separate.
meanings.sent2: The nonbonded molecules floated freely in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The nonbonded elements decided to go their separate ways.
meanings.sent4: The nonbonded relationship between the ions was fragile and temporary.
meanings.sent5: The nonbonded particles repelled each other like magnets.

meanings.sent1: The nonbonded wires were loose and could be easily removed.
meanings.sent2: The nonbonded cables were tangled messily on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The nonbonded ropes played tug-of-war without any ties.
meanings.sent4: The nonbonded friendship was casual and carefree.
meanings.sent5: The nonbonded pieces of the puzzle didn't fit together.

meanings.sent1: The nonbonded bricks fell apart easily when touched.
meanings.sent2: The nonbonded magnets repelled each other when brought close.
meanings.sent3: The nonbonded puzzle pieces refused to form a complete picture.
meanings.sent4: The nonbonded teams competed against each other in the game.
meanings.sent5: The nonbonded fabric layers could be separated with a gentle pull.
